sentences.sContent: Acid-hydrolysis and hydrolysate decolorized conditions for compound amino-acids production from duck feather are studied by using orthogonal tests.
sentences.sContent_eng: Acid-hydrolysis and hydrolysate decolorized conditions for compound amino-acids production from duck feather are studied by using orthogonal tests.
sentences.sCn: 通过正交实验对利用鸭毛酸水解生产复合氨基酸的水解条件及水解液的脱色条件进行了研究。

sentences.sContent: The review discusses many ways of preparing hydrazine through hydrolysis of Azine, and the effects of catalyst to yield of hydrazine by hydrolyzing azine.
sentences.sContent_eng: The review discusses many ways of preparing hydrazine through hydrolysis of Azine, and the effects of catalyst to yield of hydrazine by hydrolyzing azine.
sentences.sCn: 摘要文中讨论了酮连氮水解制备肼的各种方法及催化剂对酮连氮水解和肼收率的影响。

words.tran: 加氢；[化学] 氢化作用
水解液；[生化] 水解产物

trans.tranOther: a chemical reaction in which a compound reacts with water to produce other compounds
